summary.subject: Open Positions: Assistant Professors in Software Engineering and AI, University of Victoria, Canada
summary.positions: Up to 4 research stream assistant professor positions

qualification_requirements.degree: Ph.D. in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Electrical or Computer Engineering (with a research focus in Software), or equivalent
qualification_requirements.research_record: Demonstrated record of research accomplishment, including publications in top international conference venues and journals in Software Engineering
qualification_requirements.teaching_commitment: Commitment to teaching software engineering courses at the senior undergraduate and graduate levels

preferred_experience.student_supervision: Plan for graduate student supervision; mentoring experience considered an asset
preferred_experience.professionalism: Evidence of collaboration and ability to operate in a collegial academic environment

summary.research_focus: Research on Generative AI's impact on Software Engineering and evolution of Software Engineering to support development of Generative AI applications
